ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then subsequently you will certainly die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And then you will certainly die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereafter you are destined to die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then after that, certainly all of you are to die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: After that, surely you will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then after that you will most surely die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then after that you shall surely die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then lo! after that ye surely die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: after this you shall surely die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily, thereafter, ye are sure to die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then indeed you die after that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: After that, at length ye will die
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: After that, surely, you will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: After that you shall surely die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, after that, you will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:15] Then indeed after that you die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then lo! after that ye surely die.
